akn:content.akn:p:
§ 211. Allowance of deductions In computing taxable income under section 63, there shall be allowed as deductions the items specified in this part, subject to the exceptions provided in part IX (section 261 and following, relating to items not deductible). (Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 69; Pub. L. 95–30, title I, § 102(b)(3), May 23, 1977, 91 Stat. 137.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1977—Pub. L. 95–30 substituted “section 63” for “section 63(a)”.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of 1977 AmendmentAmendment by Pub. L. 95–30 applicable to taxable years beginning after Dec. 31, 1976, see section 106(a) of Pub. L. 95–30, set out as a note under section 1 of this title.
